# HUD::SET_GPS_CUSTOM_ROUTE_RENDER

## Summary
Adds a point to a gps cutsom route at the given vector

## Parameters
* **BOOL** on
* **INT** routeWidthMiniMap: & iRouteWidthPauseMap define the size of the route on the maps (specifying -1 for either will use the in-game defaults)
* **INT** routeWidthPauseMap

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Once custom GPS route is defined (by whatever means) this sets it to render, or turns it off

radarThickness: The width of the GPS route on the radar
mapThickness: The width of the GPS route on the map
